settings.text: Offsetting is not a substitute for reducing our carbon footprint; it is merely a last resort to compensate for emissions we cannot avoid. A carbon offset must result in a reduction of CO2 emissions that would not have occurred otherwise.
With one click, EcoCart enables you to balance your carbon footprint from online transactions and donates a portion of your purchase to offset the carbon footprint of your order.

Shop app users can select ShopPay at checkout, which can be used quickly and securely, storing their shipping preferences and information for convenience. Using Shop, you can even see your individual carbon offsets and eco-footprint directly in the app. To date, Shop's projects have protected more than 11 million trees in the Peruvian rainforest to offset more than 10,000 tons of carbon emissions!

settings.title: To help curb unwanted carbon emissions, we offer:

settings.text:
With one click, EcoCart enables you to balance your carbon footprint from online transactions and donates a portion of your purchase to offset the carbon footprint of your order. 

When you select EcoCart at checkout, you are supporting one of their many environmental projects, which range from providing clean drinking water to funding wind farms and ocean cleanup, which have offset 25,870,932 pounds of carbon and saved 848,214 trees. Each of EcoCart's projects offers carbon offset Laboratory and field testing with third-party verification and site visits to ensure successful calculation of greenhouse gas reductions and enable a project to periodically issue credits. These credits are measured in metric tons (tonnes) of carbon dioxide equivalents (mtCO₂e). EcoCart then evaluates the implementation of the methodology and confirms that the project uses the majority of the proceeds from carbon for growth and not profit. All projects are independently certified to internationally recognized standards.

Shop app users can select ShopPay at checkout, which can be used quickly and securely, storing their shipping preferences and information for convenience. Using Shop, you can even see your individual carbon offsets and eco-footprint directly in the app. To date, Shop's projects have protected more than 11 million trees in the Peruvian rainforest to offset more than 10,000 tons of carbon emissions!


Download the Shop app today for iOS and Android to carbon offset your deliveries for free.
